        <script><![CDATA[var dbom = new GlideDBObjectManager.get();
var base = dbom.getAbsoluteBase(current.name);
var tables = dbom.getAllExtensions(base);
var um = new GlideUpdateManager2();
      
// if disabling text_index for a child table, disallow the change
if (current.name != base && !current.text_index) {
 current.text_index = 'true';
 gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('The {0} table extends the {1} table, which is text indexed, so {2} will remain text indexed. To remove the text index for ALL tables that extend {3}, uncheck the "Text index" field for that table.',[current.name,base,current.name,base]));

// else the user is enabling text_index for a child table
// or the user is enabling/disabling text_index for a base table
} else {
 var updateMessage = 'Updating the text_index field of all tables in the hierarchy of base table ' + base + ' to ' + current.text_index;
 gs.info(updateMessage);
 gs.addInfoMessage(updateMessage);
 
 // set text_index flag for the entire hierarchy equal to the new value of current.text_index
 var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
 gr.addQuery('element', '');
 gr.addQuery('name', tables);
 gr.addQuery('text_index', !current.text_index);
 gr.setWorkflow(false);
 gr.query();
 while (gr.next()) {
  gr.setValue('text_index', current.text_index); 
  gr.update();
  um.saveRecord(gr);
 }
 
 if (!current.text_index) {
  // disable index (true==>false), we also change the text_index = false for columns sys_dictionary entry.
  var columnGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
  columnGr.addNotNullQuery('element');   
  var qc = columnGr.addQuery('name', current.name);
        if((!gs.nil(tables)) && tables.size()>0){
            qc.addOrCondition('name', tables);
   }
  columnGr.addQuery('text_index', true);
  columnGr.setWorkflow(false);
  columnGr.query();
  while (columnGr.next()) {
   columnGr.setValue('text_index', false);
   columnGr.update();
   um.saveRecord(columnGr);
  }
 }
}]]></script>
